Reviews.Title: hate it
Reviews.Author: Amanda Kathryn Mayberry
Reviews.Content: This computer was for my daughter to go away for school I am very disappointed;the hard drive is fried it will not save or download.

Reviews.Title: So cute, so awful.
Reviews.Author: S. Pounders "notspoiledbymodern"
Reviews.Content: This had scratches allover the white casing and did not work properly. I should have returned it but wanted one so bad because it is such a work of art by Steve Jobs. This computer made a sputtering noise and then after owning it a month the real problems started. I am a writer and so I use laptops as typewriters. This is the worst I have ever owned. When typing, the paragraphs would disappear or the curser would jump to another area and make you type words out of order. The keys would not make words as fast as you could type. It also could never work without being plugged in. I ended up pawning it and only got $20. Very sad.

Reviews.Title: Great starter for someone that has never owned a Mac
Reviews.Author: Ganogrlshop
Reviews.Content: Its an ace computer! I will be needing to upgrade the RAM in the near future, but other than that its ace!
